taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Occurs in brooks, swamps, polls and streams in the humid forested and highland savanna and rainforest (Ref. 3788).  Not a seasonal killifish. Bottom spawner, 1 month incubation (Ref. 27139).  Aquarium keeping:  minimum aquarium size 60 cm (Ref. 51539).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  Cross River and the lower part of the Beno.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Size
dataObjects.title: Max. size

dataObjects.description: Costia Disease. Parasitic infestations (protozoa, worms, etc.)

The following is a representative barcode sequence, the centroid of all available sequences for this species.


There is 1 barcode sequence available from BOLD and GenBank.

Below is the sequence of the barcode region Cytochrome oxidase subunit 1 (COI or COX1) from a member of the species.

See the BOLD taxonomy browser for more complete information about this specimen.

dataObjects.title: File:Fundulopanchax gardneri nigerianus Makurdi.jpg
dataObjects.description: German: 1="Nigeria Prachtkärpfling", Fundulopanchax gardneri nigerianus "Makurdi" (Clausen, 1963). Ein westafrikanischen Eierlegende Zahnkarpf der Ordnung Cyprinodontiformes. Diese erwachsenen Mann stammt aus einem Ort außerhalb von Makurdi, Nigeria.  English: 1="Nigerian killi", Fundulopanchax gardneri nigerianus "Makurdi" (Clausen, 1963). A West African species of killifish in the order Cyprinodontiformes. This adult male stems from a locality outside of Makurdi, Nigeria.  Swedish: 1=Fundulopanchax gardneri nigerianus "Makurdi" (Clausen, 1963). En västafrikansk äggläggande tandkarp i ordningen Cyprinodontiformes. Denna vuxna hane härstammar från en lokalitet utanför Makurdi, Nigeria.
